Posts.EditableText:
I was just wondering if there were any rules on cuss words, hyperviolence, or sexual stuff. Maybe I'm oblivious, but I can't seem to find any clearly stated rules.
Is it just anything goes then?
Posts.HTML:
I was just wondering if there were any rules on cuss words, hyperviolence, or sexual stuff. Maybe I'm oblivious, but I can't seem to find any clearly stated rules.
Is it just anything goes then?

Posts.EditableText:
As long as you clarify that the game is ADULT...
Personally... an f-bomb here and one there, provided it adds to the story, is not a problem...
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Thank you very much. The story I'm writing just has a good amount f violence and cussing and a hint of sexual stuff, so I wanted to make sure. I'll be sure to mark it.
Posts.HTML: Thank you very much. The story I'm writing just has a good amount f violence and cussing and a hint of sexual stuff, so I wanted to make sure. I'll be sure to mark it.

Posts.EditableText:
Well, since we took over the web, we had to censor two games of a user that was pedophile-themed. It is evident that although everything here is recorded are stories do not want to be part of anything that promotes this kind of thing. Sexist pardon, pedophilia, to put two examples, I think we are all old enough to know that what we write is or is not right.

For our part, we hope to solve those rules that indicate that they are visible in brief but still if any user warns us about a game that is an inappropriate topic we will analyze it and we will not shake the pulse when erasing it or delete the Account of the user.

There to be a little aware that society is already rotten enough so that from here we support that kind of thing.

For what "normal" thing there will be no problem publishing it.
